testsuite.name: demo.com.tutorialninja.testsuite.DesktopPageTest
testsuite.system-out: Mouse Hover On Desktop[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (c7ea0de118783c8b928ba3404ac36698)] -> link text: Desktops] click On Show All Desktop[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (c7ea0de118783c8b928ba3404ac36698)] -> link text: Show All Desktops] Sort Name (A - Z) By Position NameAtoZ[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (c7ea0de118783c8b928ba3404ac36698)] -> xpath: //select[@id='input-sort']] Click On Product HPLP3065[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (c7ea0de118783c8b928ba3404ac36698)] -> link text: HP LP3065] Get HPLP3065Text From List[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (c7ea0de118783c8b928ba3404ac36698)] -> xpath: //h1[contains(text(),'HP LP3065')]] Select Delivery Date enter Quantity1[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (c7ea0de118783c8b928ba3404ac36698)] -> xpath: //input[@id='input-quantity']] Click On Add To Cart[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (c7ea0de118783c8b928ba3404ac36698)] -> xpath: //button[@id='button-cart']] verifyProductAddedToShoppingCartText[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (c7ea0de118783c8b928ba3404ac36698)] -> xpath: //div[@class='alert alert-success alert-dismissible']] clickOnShoppingCart[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (c7ea0de118783c8b928ba3404ac36698)] -> xpath: //span[contains(text(),'Shopping Cart')]] Verify Text ShoppingCart[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (c7ea0de118783c8b928ba3404ac36698)] -> xpath: //div[@id='content']//h1] VerifyTextProductNameHPLP3065[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (c7ea0de118783c8b928ba3404ac36698)] -> link text: HP LP3065] verifyDeliveryDate[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (c7ea0de118783c8b928ba3404ac36698)] -> xpath: //div[@class = 'table-responsive']/table/tbody/tr/td[2]/small[1]] Verify TheModelProduct21 Text[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (c7ea0de118783c8b928ba3404ac36698)] -> xpath: //td[contains(text(),'Product 21')]] verifyTheTotalPriceText[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (c7ea0de118783c8b928ba3404ac36698)] -> xpath: //div[@class = 'table-responsive']/table/tbody/tr/td[6]]
